movement.default: select mv.id, p.code as partnumber, p.product_name as product, mv.qty as qty, case when p.unit is null then '' else p.unit end as unit, COALESCE(mv.notes, '') as batch_no, substr(cast(mv.shipping_time as char(16)), 1, 16) as shippingdate, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse from movement_view mv inner join product_view p on mv.product_code=p.code left join place pl on mv.place_code=pl.code where mv.shared = false and mv.trans_code = @code order by mv.id
movement.mssql: select mv.id, p.code as partnumber, p.product_name as product, mv.qty as qty, case when p.unit is null then '' else p.unit end as unit, COALESCE(mv.notes, '') as batch_no, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), mv.shipping_time, 120) as shippingdate, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse from movement_view mv inner join product_view p on mv.product_code=p.code left join place pl on mv.place_code=pl.code where mv.shared = false and mv.trans_code = @code order by mv.id

head.default: select t.code as transnumber, substr(cast(t.time_stamp as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, substr(cast(t.trans_date as char(10)), 1, 10) as startdate, substr(cast(t.due_time as char(16)), 1, 16) as enddate, COALESCE(t.notes, '') as notes, COALESCE(t.report_notes, '') as fnote, COALESCE(t.trans_code, '') as ref_transnumber, comp.customer_name as comp_name, case when comp.zip_code is null then '' else comp.zip_code end as comp_zipcode, case when comp.city is null then '' else comp.city end as comp_city, case when comp.street is null then '' else comp.street end as comp_street, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse, COALESCE(mv.notes, '') as batch_no, mv.qty, p.code as partnumber, p.product_name as product, t.tag_lst as tags from trans_view t inner join movement_view mv on mv.trans_code=t.code and mv.shared = true inner join product p on mv.product_code=p.code inner join place_view pl on mv.place_code=pl.code, (select c.code, c.customer_name, ca.zip_code, ca.city, ca.street from customer c left join customer_addresses ca on ca.code=c.code where c.customer_type='CUSTOMER_OWN' limit 1) comp where t.code = @code
head.mssql: select t.code as transnumber, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.time_stamp, 120) as crdate, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.trans_date, 120) as startdate, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), t.due_time, 120) as enddate, COALESCE(t.notes, '') as notes, COALESCE(t.report_notes, '') as fnote, COALESCE(t.trans_code, '') as ref_transnumber, comp.customer_name as comp_name, case when comp.zip_code is null then '' else comp.zip_code end as comp_zipcode, case when comp.city is null then '' else comp.city end as comp_city, case when comp.street is null then '' else comp.street end as comp_street, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse, COALESCE(mv.notes, '') as batch_no, mv.qty, p.code as partnumber, p.product_name as product, t.tag_lst as tags from trans_view t inner join movement_view mv on mv.trans_code=t.code and mv.shared = true inner join product p on mv.product_code=p.code inner join place_view pl on mv.place_code=pl.code, (select c.code, c.customer_name, ca.zip_code, ca.city, ca.street from customer c left join customer_addresses ca on ca.code=c.code where c.customer_type='CUSTOMER_OWN' limit 1) comp where t.code = @code

fieldvalue.default: select map_key as fielddef, map_value as value, map_type as notes from trans_map where code = @code
